Title: Relates to adult vaccination reporting requirements
Summary: Requires a health care provider who administers an immunization to a person nineteen years of age or older to report such information to the department of health or to the New York city citywide immunization registry unless the person receiving the immunization objects to such reporting.
LawCode: Amd ยง2168, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to adult immunization reporting requirements
